title: Hour 2: Sorry Mr. Jackson *hoooo*
description:
Stephen A, Bart Scott and Marcus Spears discuss if Lamar should sit out games this year, if the Bills have shaken their traumatic past and a reaction to BYU finding no evidence of racial heckling on Aug. 26th.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Will the Ravens regret not extending Lamar Jackson before the season?
